SummaryEnglish: The story begins when a middle school girl named Yume sees something fall from the sky, and meets a pale violet-colored kitten named Mew. It turns out that Mew has the power of "Yume Synchro" (Dream Synchro), the power to enter dreams. In the dream world, the girl and Mew collect Dream Stones.

1.TitleEnglish: We Were Able to Dream Synchro!

9.TitleEnglish: Appearance in the Comedy Grand Prix!
9.SummaryEnglish: Maira and Peko will participate the junior and senior high school comedy grand prix. They're busy making materials at school too! And the day of the Grand Prix came. The two of them are enthusiastic and show off their comedies, but after all Yuni and others are also coming...

10.SummaryEnglish: Maira and others, who decided to post outdoor photos in a magazine project, decided to go to Tokiwa's grandmother's place. They enjoyed nature as they picked edible wild plants and went fishing, but it started to rain so they took shelter. At that time, they heard a fun sound mixed with the sound of rain! Meanwhile, Yuni and Ackey also came to the campsite...

12.SummaryEnglish: Icchy & Naru and Mew challenge various things! This time they challenge drawing? Can they do it well?

13.TitleEnglish: The Milky Way is Excitingly Twinkling!
13.SummaryEnglish: The Tanabata Festival will be held in Ichigo Town soon. Yume's class will participate in the "Tanabata Decoration Contest" held at the festival! And the Dream Partners who heard that will also have a Tanabata festival at the castle in the sky! Yume and co. are full of fun things. However, it was Yuni and others who disturbed such a fun Tanabata. They rewrote everyone's wishes!

14.TitleEnglish: The Sky is Glittering Fireworks Display
14.SummaryEnglish: Summer tradition, fireworks display! Everyone is looking forward to this year as they can put a message on the fireworks. The day of the fireworks display came. Everyone is participating while wearing yukata this year as well. Then, a lottery was held to see who would put the message on the fireworks, and Asahi won the prize! What kind of message will Asahi make in the night sky?

16.SummaryEnglish: Icchy & Naru and Mew challenge various things! This time they try "Cheer-Furu"? Can they do it well?

18.SummaryEnglish: Mewkledreamy Mix with Icchy & Naru and Mew! Let's enjoy!

19.TitleEnglish: This Year is also Yume-chan's Birthday in the Training Camp
19.SummaryEnglish: Summer training camp has arrived! And this year is also the birthday of Yume! Maira and others planned a birthday party in secret. Mew and others are preparing cakes at the castle in the sky! This is the end of the training camp. Of course this year is also barbecue! The glittering couples Shouhei and Wakaba were getting along and preparing for a barbecue, but suddenly Wakaba felt darker than she was. After all this was...!? On the other hand, Asahi and Morimura had become alone again! Yume's birthday has a turbulent feeling this year as well!

21.TitleEnglish: I Also Want to Give a Present
21.SummaryEnglish: The end of summer vacation. This year too, Yume didn't finish her summer vacation homework... Meanwhile, the Queen sisters appeared in her dream. They said that a wish still remains! Yume was excited about what she'd get, but first of all, she had to do her best to finish the homework! On the other hand, Ackey learnt that there was a birthday party for Yume at the training camp, and was struggling to give her a birthday present! After seeing such Ackey, Yuni and others decided to become the cupid of love for him.

22.SummaryEnglish: A sweets contest will be held at Ichigo Shopping Street. Yume and others will also participate in the contest, and will work hard to make sweets with the aim of winning! On the other hand, in order to make Yume happy, Ackey will also participate in making sweets. Yuni and co., who saw such Ackey, were there for him... Whose sweets will win the contest...!?

23.TitleEnglish: Donshagaran on the Banks of the River!
23.SummaryEnglish: Yume, who still can't overcome her dislike on tomatoes this year, is relieved that the tomato season is over. For some reason, Ackey, who was watching such Yume, misunderstood that Yume loves tomatoes!! Meanwhile, Yume and her friends planned a barbecue by the river. Mew and others will work hard to prepare various vegetables from the field of the castle above the sky! It's barbecue time. Ackey misunderstood that Yume likes tomatoes and gave Yume tomatoes as gift. And this year too, Yume's natural enemy is...!?

24.TitleEnglish: The Secret Room Above the Sky
24.SummaryEnglish: One day, Yume was called by the Queens and headed for the castle in the sky. How cute the castle is remodeled! The fairies' work room has been created, the kitchen has become cute, and the castle has been reborn as a ever more wonderful castle! Yume and others look around the castle, and there is one mysterious room...!?

25.TitleEnglish: AI Robot Challenge with Icchy & Naru!
25.SummaryEnglish: Icchy & Naru and Mew challenge various things! This time they try AI Robot? Can they do it well?

26.SummaryEnglish: The Queens and Yume and co. found the "History Book of Miracle Dreamy Kingdom". Immediately after seeing the contents, Yume and her friends learnt about the history of Mewkledreamy Kingdom... On the other hand, is Ackey acting strange recently? Akumu noticed that. She visited Ichigo Junior High School to find out the cause...

27.SummaryEnglish: An athletic meet is held at Ichigo Junior High School, where Yume attends. The climax of the athletic meet is a class relay competition! The anchor is Tokiwa! Tokiwa is fast and overtook other players, becoming the 1st place brilliantly! Watching it, Akumu aims at Nene!

28.SummaryEnglish: Maira's birthday is coming soon! Maira decided to go on a trip to Kyoto with Yume and others. Visiting temples and eating dumplings, they all enjoyed sightseeing in Kyoto to their heart's content! And the fun time is instant. It's time for good night. Maira put a picture of her mother on her bedside and went to sleep so that she could have a good dream.

29.SummaryEnglish: Halloween is coming soon! Yume and friends got excited deciding what kind of costume they would wear. On the other hand, Akumu also worked hard to prepare for Halloween in Nightmare Land. And that day came. The square of Ichigo Town is full of people in nice costumes with delicious sweets lined up! The ones who came there were Yuni, who loves mischief more than anyone else!?

30.SummaryEnglish: Icchy & Naru and Mew challenge various things! This time they try bananas? What will happen?

31.SummaryEnglish: The school festival is approaching. Manzai combination Dasshi & Fun'nyuu of Peko and Maira will challenge the stage again this year! There is no doubt that the stage of the comedy studying club, which has increased in number of members and has been powered up, will be exciting! On the other hand, Akumu paid attention to Peko, who works hard to practice comedies.

32.SummaryEnglish: It's almost the birthday of Choyo and Haruru! Yume is planning a birthday party for the morning sun, but I'm wondering what to give as a gift. Meanwhile, there seems to be a birthday party for Haruru on the same day...Can Yume give a present to Chaoyang to celebrate!??

33.SummaryEnglish: Yume and Mew who are accustomed to taking care of Chia have a relaxing tea time! Yume and his friends, who spend a peaceful day, decided to synchronize with Rei at the suggestion of Rei! What kind of scenery is spreading in Rei's dream? And a disturbing shadow that threatens a peaceful day...

34.SummaryEnglish: Ichi & Naru and Mew challenge various things! How do you like to challenge Senryu this time? Can you do it well?

35.SummaryEnglish: Kotoko will be taken from Yume to maintain Chia Furu Wand. On the other hand, Yuni and others carefully plan their strategy that they cannot fail next time! And Yuni's strategy was a great success! You will be robbed of your cheerful wand and glasses! Will the dreams be able to regain their precious cheerful wands and glasses?

36.SummaryEnglish: Cleaning the castle today! All of Mew will make the castle shiny! On the other hand, even at the Yume house, it's a big cleaning... Apparently daddy has a face that doesn't float. What happened?

39.TitleEnglish: I Have Something Important to Say!
